last_episode_to_air.name: There's No Business Like Bro Business (2)

name: Zeke and Luther
overview: Zeke and Luther want nothing more in the world than to become world-famous skateboarders. Together with their friends, skating rivals, and family, Zeke & Luther find themselves always busy getting into mischief.

episodes.name: Bros Go Pro
episodes.overview: Ginger books Zeke and Luther to perform a skateboarding stunt, by skating off a ramp and jumping over four king-size mattresses. But fooling around in their hotel room causes them to nearly miss the event.

episodes.name: Donut Jockey
episodes.overview: Zeke and Luther get jobs as delivery men at Don's Donuts, in order to pay for new skateboard parts. Luther gets hustled by bratty little kids for free donuts, while Zeke makes frequent deliveries to an obsessed girl named Lisa Grubner.

episodes.name: Crash and Learn
episodes.overview: Zeke and Luther accidentally destroy their grumpy neighbor's garden, and leave Kojo with the blame.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Zeke and Luther try to get skateboarding sponsorship. Zeke arranges for the two to skateboard into the "Tunnel of Terror" to impress his British neighbor, but Luther drops out when the two get in a fight.

episodes.name: Cape Fear
episodes.overview: Zeke wants to have his own trademark skateboarding costume feature. Olivia volunteers to make him something, and gives him a cape.

episodes.name: Skate Camp
episodes.overview: The guys open up a skateboarding camp to encourage kids to take up the sport and Ozzie enrolls, but shows a lack of enthusiasm. Meanwhile, Ginger and Lisa plan a flute-playing competition.

episodes.name: Luck Be a Rodent Tonight
episodes.overview: Zeke and Luther try to make a skateboarding video after Kojo gets his mom to film one. They convince Garrett "Stinky Cast" Delfino, who has a crush on Ginger, to film it, and come out with a great video, but Luther's "good luck charm" rat eats the tape on the night that Zeke and Luther plan to present it to a large audience.

episodes.name: Cup Stacking
episodes.overview: Zeke and Luther are preparing to set a new two-man butt-boarding record. And things seem set until their training gets interrupted by Lutherâ€™s new-found fascination with cup stacking.

episodes.name: Summer School
episodes.overview: Zeke must sit through summer school with his not so very nice algebra teacher. He later learns that he was once an avid skateboarder and challenges him to a skateboarding competition to get out of taking classes for the rest of the summer. Meanwhile, Stinky Cast tries his best to impress Ginger, but ends up humiliating her instead.

episodes.name: Haunted Board
episodes.overview: Zeke and Luther are haunted when a cool looking board they bought off the internet turns out to be the legendary cursed "Eye of the Cat". In the meantime, Stinky Cast strikes a deal with Ginger in which he bets that he can truly frighten her.

episodes.name: Road Trip
episodes.overview: Zeke and Luther's favorite skate boarder of all time is Tony Hawk, and they find themselves on a trip to his childhood home.

episodes.name: Luther Leads
episodes.overview: Zeke and Luther celebrate their tenth anniversary of skateboarding together and find a security video from Donut Don that shows Luther was the first to ride a skateboard that the two of them found ten years ago. Meanwhile, Ginger wins a contest at Don's Donuts that promises her to own the establishment when Don retires.

episodes.name: Soul Bucket
episodes.overview: Luther's grandmother wants his rock band, Soul Bucket to perform for her. Meanwhile, Ginger holds open auditions for a new best friend to replace Poochie.

episodes.name: Not My Sister's Keeper
episodes.overview: When a contest is held at Don's Donuts, the prize is a rare skateboard. But when Ginger goes missing, will Zeke search for her or just try to win the board?

episodes.name: Rollerdorks
episodes.overview: A feud breaks out between the skaters and the "Rollerdorks", a gang of disco dancing roller bladers. Meanwhile, Ginger uses Poochie's bird to get revenge on Zeke.

episodes.name: Crash Dummies
episodes.overview: Zeke and Luther send a video to a show that features stunts performed on skateboards and are picked to join the show. Meanwhile, Ginger plans her own "surprise" birthday party and tries to get a guy who likes only girls who are taller than him.

episodes.name: Adventure Boy
episodes.overview: Zeke hopes to win Olivia over before she falls for a visiting TV hunk. Meanwhile, Luther takes care of a dog named Rufus that causes trouble.

episodes.name: I, Skatebot
episodes.overview: When Mr. Fitzle's skater-hating robot goes out of control and tries to destroy everyone, Zeke and Luther must risk their lives to destroy the robot.

episodes.name: Law and Boarder
episodes.overview: After Zeke and Luther ruin Ginger's potato wedge stand business, She gets revenge by having strict skateboarding laws implemented in the neighborhood.

episodes.name: A Very Hairy Problem
episodes.overview: Zeke risks everything to help Luther bring a movie gorilla named Sammy back to the reserve he came from.

episodes.name: Skate Squad
episodes.overview: Zeke and Luther along with Kojo and Ozzie form a varsity skate squad to get out of gym class.

episodes.name: Zeke Jumps the Shark
episodes.overview: Zeke reluctantly agrees to perform a skate stunt where he jumps over a shark tank â€” with a shark inside it. Meanwhile, Ginger, believing that Zeke won't survive the stunt, finds a replacement brother.

episodes.name: Tall Stack of Waffles
episodes.overview: Luther decides to retire from skateboarding after he is told he will grow to be over 7 feet tall.

episodes.name: Airheads
episodes.overview: After a string of bad luck with their skateboarding, Zeke and Luther form an air rock band with Kojo and Ozzie joining later on. Everything goes well until Luther takes the hobby way too seriously, making Zeke upset and having Luther fire him from the band. Meanwhile, Ginger is determined to win as many contests as possible at the county fair.

episodes.name: Luther Unleashed
episodes.overview: Luther becomes frustrated with Ozzie "posing" as a skater and wants him to stop once and for all. So Zeke encourages Ozzie to try skate photography. When the photos are taken, Ozzie purposely photoshops his head onto Luther's body when he performs a great skateboarding move. Luther becomes upset by this and challenges Ozzie to a mixed martial arts match, not realizing that Ozzie only did that to impress his older and more talented brother. Meanwhile, Zeke and Ginger pull bathroom pranks on each other and Kojo tries to impress his girlfriend, Monica with his singing.

episodes.name: Old Nasty
episodes.overview: Zeke is astonished when Ginger takes up interest in skateboarding after Luther secretly gives her lessons in exchange for helping him fill out a video game rental form. Zeke later finds out that the only reason why Ginger is interested in the sport is because of her having a crush on Deuce (Ryan Ochoa), the new kid in town. Ginger is willing to do anything to impress Deuce even if that means skateboarding on "Old Nasty", a dangerous contraption Zeke and Luther help build at "Ramps".

episodes.name: Double Crush
episodes.overview: Zeke and Luther are both smitten by a BMX biker girl named Dani, so Kojo offers to play matchmaker and oversee a series of dates with them to determine which skater boy Dani likes best.

episodes.name: Plunk Hunting
episodes.overview: Zeke and Luther chase after the Plunks, who have stolen Nana Waffles' wig.

episodes.name: Kojo's BFF
episodes.overview: Kojo recruits Tiki Delgado, a professional skater, to compete against Zeke and Luther in a skating competition. But when Tiki turns out to be a jerk, Zeke and Luther encourage Kojo not to be pushed around by him anymore. Meanwhile, Luther is being haunted by a man-sized banana. Or as Luther calls it "The Manana".

episodes.name: One Strange Night
episodes.overview: Zeke, Luther and Kojo misplace their friend Kirby Cheddar after having a snow cone party with decade-expired snow cone syrup.

episodes.name: Luther Waffles & The Skateboard of Doom (1)
episodes.overview: Zeke and Luther are as excited as they can be when they get summer jobs at a skateboard testing factory; but before long, things start to become suspicious and they realize that their boss, Garm Garoosh, an ex-professional skater, is out to destroy Luther Waffles for ending his skateboard career. Meanwhile, Ginger tags along with the guys to sell her potato wedge maker to Mr. Garoosh and Nana Waffles wrecks Luther's room while he is gone.

episodes.name: Luther Waffles & The Skateboard of Doom (2)
Crouching Zeke, Dancing Luther
episodes.overview: Zeke dreams of a nearly impossible trick in which he balances atop his board while it stands vertically.

episodes.name: Luther Waffles: Skate Cop
episodes.overview: Deputy Dingle requires Zeke and Luther to participate in the station's Police Ride-Along Program and Luther really takes to the job. Meanwhile, Ginger accidentally gets kissed by Stinky Cast.

episodes.name: Treasure
episodes.overview: Zeke and Luther try to find a treasure of a famous banjo player/bank robber.

episodes.name: Rocket Men
episodes.overview: Zeke and Luther train with "Jumpsuit" Johnson to pull off a stunt with his rocket to get into a skateboarding magazine. Meanwhile, Ginger tries to get back a hat from Ozzie that is believed to have been worn by Abraham Lincoln.

episodes.name: Board in Class
episodes.overview: Zeke and Luther fear they will get a bad grade in shop class since their Nana rejects their teacher's marriage proposal. Meanwhile, Ginger gets a cereal named after her.

episodes.name: Local Heroes
episodes.overview: Zeke and Luther mistakenly assume the store they work at is being robbed. Meanwhile Ginger obsesses over a stuffed toy in a claw machine.

episodes.name: Super Shredder
episodes.overview: When Zeke and Luther convince an amateur at the skate park to try skateboarding full-time, they discover they've talked their favorite wrestler into quitting his day job.

episodes.name: Little Bro, Big Trouble
episodes.overview: Luther tries to spend time with his little brother Roy (Davis Cleveland) but he goes off and starts hanging with the Plunks, while Ginger gets mad at Zeke because his brother is trying to be nice but always ends up failing.

episodes.name: Robo-Luth
episodes.overview: Luther gets a new robotic knee; Luther must choose between saving his new knee or his best friend.

episodes.name: The Bro List
episodes.overview: Pro-skateboarder Tony Hawk arrives when Zeke and Luther set out to accomplish everything on their "bro list" before Luther moves out of town. As they complete each item on the list, they come down to the final task â€“ to meet and skateboard with pro-skateboarder Tony Hawk. After searching high and low for the famous skateboarder, the guys finally have a chance to come face to face with their idol.

episodes.name: Seoul Bros
episodes.overview: After finding the best manager of skate in the world, Zeke and Luther show a video of your stunts. The entrepreneur likes them, but find they are very young. After a poster boys come out of the water mark of a Korean Zeke and Luther says he can and who speak Korean. They go and do the propaganda. But after Luther without wanting to throw up water on the brand owner, everything goes wrong.

episodes.name: Sludge
episodes.overview: Kojo has crush on Zeke's visiting cousin Mia (Lili Simmons).

episodes.name: Goin' Zoomin
episodes.overview: Zeke and Luther must choose between two company sponsors.

episodes.name: Ball of Trash
episodes.overview: Zeke and Luther try to get rid of a giant ball of trash.

episodes.name: Bro-ho-ho
episodes.overview: Zeke and Luther get jobs as a mall Santa and elf. Kirby Cheddar visits. Luther meanwhile tells Kirby's mom that Kirby wants a special skateboard, two of them that both Zeke and Luther want. So, they get their gift from Kirby as he says he didn't want it. Zeke and Luther then try to make it better, although they can't find the gift he wants. So they give him a football. Santa magically changes it to what he wants. But it all ends up happily. Santa Claus teaches Ginger the true meaning of Christmas.

episodes.name: Zeke's Last Ride
episodes.overview: While doing a stunt in local Gilroy, Zeke has a massive wipeout and ends up in the hospital.

episodes.name: The Unusual Suspects
episodes.overview: Zeke and Luther question the suspects after Zeke is thrown from the pier while asleep.

episodes.name: Two Guys, A Car, And a Wild Bear
episodes.overview: Zeke and Luther are given a new car by their sponsors, but cannot afford to give it gas. So they put restaurant grease in it, which attracts a wild bear to it. Meanwhile, Ginger has a prank war with her gym coach, to force him to change her bad grade.

episodes.name: Hyp-Bro-Tized
episodes.overview: Luther goes to see a hypnotherapist because he is afraid to talk to a girl he likes. But he falls for another girl named Ronda who is from a motorcycle gang. The leader of the gang asks Luther to join their posse, but must complete the test.

episodes.name: Daredevils!
episodes.overview: Zeke and Luther win a contest to do the final stunt for a famous daredevil when he gets injured. Kojo dates a really tall girl.

episodes.name: Sibling Rivalries
episodes.overview: When asked to do a skate show, the host asks if Zeke and Luther have siblings so that they could come on the show. Fearing that they will humiliate them, Zeke and Luther get a fake Ginger and Roy.

episodes.name: Luther Turns 4
episodes.overview: Luther celebrates his Leap year birthday turning four years old, but the celebration goes too far when he plans to be the world's best 4-year old.

episodes.name: Head of Skate
episodes.overview: Zeke runs for mayor of Gilroy.

episodes.name: Zeke, Luther, and Kojo Strike Gold
episodes.overview: Zeke and Luther make a deal with their new vice principal, they help her find a golden nugget in exchange for getting out of detention and her destroying their permanent records.

episodes.name: Zeke and Lu's New Crew
episodes.overview: After starring in a local commercial Zeke and Luther attract an entourage.

episodes.name: Skater Girl Island
episodes.overview: Zeke and Luther go to skater girl island to recruit a new girl rider for the Riot skate team.

episodes.name: DJ PJ
episodes.overview: Luther becomes a hit sensation as a sleepwalking rapper.

episodes.name: Trucky Cheese
episodes.overview: After Zeke and Luther destroy Carl's new scooter, they attempt to repay their debt by selling cheese smoothies out of Carl's old food truck.

episodes.name: Ice Heist Baby
episodes.overview: Zeke and Luther must find a way to stop Mr. Montoyo's control over the ice and save Gilroy from overheating.

episodes.name: Skate Troopers
episodes.overview: Zeke and Luther get to be the stars of a show called "Skate Troopers" but Luther has a problem with one of the cast members.

episodes.name: Bro, Where's Our Car?
episodes.overview: Zeke and Luther's car gets towed right before they are booked to drive around a baseball field in it.

episodes.name: Lie Hard
episodes.overview: Zeke and Luther lie about not having a family, until their new foreign family decide to move there with Zeke and Luther.

episodes.name: Bro'd Trip
episodes.overview: Zeke and Luther take a road trip to compete in the Tempe Skate International Tournament

episodes.name: The Gingernator
episodes.overview: Zeke puts a modification chip in Ginger's earlobe changing her behavior by making her nicer.

episodes.name: Skate Video Awards
episodes.overview: Zeke and Luther enter the "Skate Video Awards" competition and try to make the best video. But when the video is finished, they realize that it is missing one thing: Skating.

episodes.name: There's No Business Like Bro Business (1)
There's No Business Like Bro Business (2)
